rdf:Description.dc:title: Mental health in Northern Alberta : addressing the issues, research report 1991 1991 addressing the issues, research report 1991 /
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Northern Alberta Development Council.
Alberta Management Group.

rdf:Description.dc:description: Prepared for: The Northern Alberta Development Council, Peace River, Alta.
Discusses a comprehensive study commissioned to identify strategies to improve the quality and quantity of mental health services in northern Alberta.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Mental health services
Mental health planning
Mental health policy
